ygData.subject: RE: Hey this sounded interesting..
ygData.msgSnippet: The topic Hey this sounded interesting.. has incited a riot!  I have not seen such an aggressive thread in weeks here...and with over 60 posts a day? I think
ygData.messageBody:
The topic "Hey this sounded interesting.." has incited a riot! I have not
seen such an aggressive thread in weeks here...and with over 60 posts a day?

I think everyone has some excellent points and makes some good arguments but
the whole thing is starting to be as pointless and repetitive as flogging a
dead horse.

Lets all agree to disagree and move forward with some new discussions.

I'm not sure where the debate over what classes are hybrids and what classes
are not is leading and I'm not sure it really makes any difference. I know
some people are going to be offended and angered at me for saying so, and I
apologize to you profusely, but please give this whole Ping-Pong match a
rest.

I really don't think there is a point to arguing over bind because if Verant
decides in the future to make some change in this area it is going to have
to be a sweeping change that gratifies all the classes that currently don't
get to self-bind or bind outside of cities. And if they took binding
outside of cities away from the classes that can do it...you can imagine
what EQVault's forums would look like.

I like you all and respect your opinions but this has gone a bit too far
don't you think?

- Faras
>
